channel.title: [637/639] Reset Interfaces
channel.description: I know in Project Insanity there is a c.getPA().resetinterfaces which is called on teleports and login. Right now if i'm in Godwars and teleport home the interface for that remains, so does anyone have a method or packet that would reset this?

item.title: [637/639] Reset Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

omgitsbob12:

How do you tell what packet is for what, in the example he used 178 was frame 178. How does he know that? Also how would you find out which packet is for resetframe since there is so many of them.

I have little idea as to how packets work in 500+ as I have never worked with them - it doesn’t appear anyone has written any other thread so I can’t help you any further sorry.

Read full topic

i know fudge all about 500+ sorry, I will have to recommend you to the following:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/163626-how-get-server-client-packets-frames.html

(it will be different but, the file for instance but they will have a similar structure)

packets should have a similar structure as far as i’m aware

item.title: [637/639] Reset Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

First of all, is it really a 637 loading 639 (I don’t keep tabs on newer versions), secondly you will need to find out which packet closes the interface which you can find client sided I believe someone here had written a tutorial on how to do so, so I shall search for that for you and see what I can find.

Read full topic
